headline: African Sweet Potato Stew
name: African Sweet Potato Stew
description: Peanut butter adds African flair to this slow-cooked sweet potato and chickpea stew perfect for a hearty vegetarian or vegan dinner.
recipeIngredient: 2 small jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
2.5 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped into 2-inch pieces
2 (15 ounce) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can sliced green beans, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, jalapeno peppers, garlic, ginger, cumin, salt, coriander, cinnamon, and red pepper flakes in a large slow cooker. Pour in water and stir to combine. Mix in sweet potatoes, tomatoes, chickpeas, and peanut butter.

Set cooker to Medium-High, cover, and cook until sweet potatoes are tender and stew has thickened, about 6 hours. Stir in green beans, cover, and continue cooking until beans are heated through, 15 to 20 minutes.
